title: Ticket #1341: Rename "user log" to "event log" or possible "job event log"
description:
The per-job log file is commonly called the "user log". This name goes all the way into the code, where the job's ClassAd points to the file with the name UserLog. However, it's confusing, as it's not a log of the user, it's a log of the job's events. Tellingly, the configuration setting to create a global user log file is EVENT_LOG, not USER_LOG. Calling it instead the "event log" or even more specifically the "job event log" would be much clearer.

This will involve changes in the code to fix user visible usages (including UserLog), the documentation, and our daily language.
